title: T3 turkey red's SOLD;  Bender, Clarke, McIntyre
author: tonyo

posts.post_title: T3 turkey red's SOLD;  Bender, Clarke, McIntyre
posts.post_content:
Prices are net too me.  Paypal preferred.   I will include shipping.  

[STRIKE]harry mcintyre $260[/STRIKE] SOLD
[STRIKE]fred clarke $400[/STRIKE] SOLD
[STRIKE]chief bender $650[/STRIKE]SOLD

added:
some one asked me if Bender had "any issues".  here is my reply:
It does have a pinhole. I think that is probably considered paper loss on the edge near his right elbow. a tiny indentation on the edge near his right ear. looks like some staining maybe on some of the borders. All that stuff can be seen in the scan. Also here is a link to the photos that you may be able to zoom in on. I don't see anything that doesn't show up in the photo.
[url]https://drive.google.com/drive/folde...Sf?usp=sharing[/url]

No creases on the Bender.

added: 
McIntyre has a pinhole, and a 1/4" long wrinkle on the bottom thru the R in McIntyre

Clark has no pinhole but he does have the wrinkle that starts at the R in Clarke and goes full height, causing some paper loss at his right elbow and actually becomes 3 wrinkles above his right shoulder.
[STRIKE]I'll lower the prices on these[/STRIKE]  I raised the prices back up while letting them ride on facebook a few days
